Paragraph: To date , no more than 10 μmR - polymers have been synthesized , which are primarily based on a very strong electron - deficient unit such as [1,2,5]thiadiazolo [3,4-g]quinoxaline , 6 thienopyrazine , 7 or thieno [3,4-c][1,2,5]thiadiazole.

| [1,2,5]thiadiazolo [3,4-g]quinoxaline |
| 6 thienopyrazine |
| 7 or thieno [3,4-c][1,2,5]thiadiazole |

Explanation:

* "10 μmR - polymers" is a type of material, so it is a Material Name entity.
* "[1,2,5]thiadiazolo [3,4-g]quinoxaline" is a specific chemical compound, which can be considered as a material, so it is a Material Name entity.
* "6 thienopyrazine" is a specific chemical compound, which can be considered as a material, so it is a Material Name entity.
* "thieno [3,4-c][1,2,5]thiadiazole" is a specific chemical compound, which can be considered as a material, so it is a Material Name entity.
* Note that the number "7" is not a Material Name entity, as it is not a material itself, but rather a quantity associated with the material "thieno [3,4-c][1,2,5]thiadiazole".
